name: com.pulsemcp.servers/pulse-fetch
description: MCP server that extracts clean, structured content from web pages with anti-bot bypass capabilities.

environmentVariables.description: API key for Firecrawl service to bypass anti-bot measures
environmentVariables.name: FIRECRAWL_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Bearer token for BrightData Web Unlocker service
environmentVariables.name: BRIGHTDATA_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Path to markdown file containing scraping strategy configuration
environmentVariables.name: STRATEGY_CONFIG_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Optimization strategy for scraping: cost or speed
environmentVariables.name: OPTIMIZE_FOR

environmentVariables.description: Storage backend for saved resources: memory or filesystem
environmentVariables.name: MCP_RESOURCE_STORAGE

environmentVariables.description: Directory for filesystem storage (only used with filesystem type)
environmentVariables.name: MCP_RESOURCE_FILESYSTEM_ROOT

environmentVariables.description: Skip API authentication health checks at startup
environmentVariables.name: SKIP_HEALTH_CHECKS

environmentVariables.description: LLM provider for extract feature: anthropic, openai, openai-compatible
environmentVariables.name: LLM_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: API key for the chosen LLM provider
environmentVariables.name: LLM_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Specific model to use for extraction
environmentVariables.name: LLM_MODEL
